pages.text: $(li)These small windged insects known as Flies are around over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They are attracted to dead dying things, like for example, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombies$(/l).$(br)$(li)Flies can be bred with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/maggot)Maggots$(/l) on death.
If a Fly happens to find itself in the Nether, it will transform into a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquito$(/l).
